cpystal.graph.graph module

cpystal.graph is a module for making graphs.

cpystal.graph.graph.graph_2zone_temperature_profile(sequence: list[list[float]]) → tuple[plt.Figure, plt.Subplot][source]

Graph the 2-zones furnace temperature profile from the sequence.

Parameters:

sequence (list[list[float]]) –

list of [time_length (hour): float,

target_temperature_material (Celsius degree): float, target_temperature_growth (Celsius degree): float].

sequence[0] should be [0, {room_temperature}, {room_temperature}].

Returns:

plt.Figure object and plt.axes._subplots.AxesZeroSubplot object.

Return type:

(tuple[plt.Figure, plt.Subplot])
